metadata.title: Domot
metadata.summary: We dey give una latest tori on top politics, environment, business, sports, entertainment, health, fashion and all di oda things wey dey happen for West and Central Africa come add di rest of di world join. For better informate plus explanation of all di ogbonge tori wey pipo never hear about for inside West and Central Africa, BBC Pidgin dey serve am with video, audio, maps and oda graphics join.

headlines.headline: “If di spoon attract me, most times na to carry am enta studio” – Collins

items.summary: Dis artist no dey take eye see spoon, as no be to chop food be di only tin him dey use am do.

media.title: “If di spoon attract me, most times na to carry am enta studio” – Collins

synopses.short: “If di spoon attract me, most times na to carry am enta studio” – Collins
synopses.long:
Almost every wia pesin turn you go see art of different kinds but dis one get as e be, unto say na spoon dis pesin take dey do im own work.

Abiniro Collins na Artist for Lagos, south west Nigeria, wey no dey use eye see spoon.

Collins tok say na wen im dey school di idea come, as im bin dey find sometin wey pipo neva too use do art work 

Collins say im dream na to create place wey young artists for Nigeria go fit go to get mentor for dia work.

Producers: Usifo Omozokpea & Sarah Tiamiyu
synopses.medium: Dis artist no dey take eye see spoon, as no be to chop food be di only tin him dey use am do.

media.caption: “If di spoon attract me, most times na to carry am enta studio” – Collins

headlines.headline: I realise my World Cup dream afta 14 years

items.summary: South Africa captain Janine van Wyk dey lead di Bayana Bayana to go hustle for di Women’s World Cup for di first time ever!

media.title: I dey realise my World Cup Dream afta 14 years

synopses.short: France 2019 Women's World Cup: Janine van Wyk go lead South Africa compete for first time
synopses.long:
Janine van Wyk don play for South Africa Women's team for 14 years. 

But dis summer, for di first di captain go lead di Banyana Banyana go France 2019 World Cup. 

She discuss her dreams, determination and development wit BBC Sport Africa inside dis BBC Africa one minute tori.

Dis na behind dis scenes wit South Africa captain wey dey lead di Bayana Bayana to go husle for di Women’s World Cup for di first time ever!
synopses.medium: Dis na behind dis scenes wit South Africa captain wey dey lead di Bayana Bayana to go husle for di Women’s World Cup for difirst time ever!

media.caption: Janine van Wyk go lead South Africa go di Women's World Cup for di first time.

headlines.headline: Henna Design di natural tattoo

items.summary: Weda na for religion or fashion, henna design na natural way to tattoo bodi witout any wahala.

synopses.long:
Henna, di natural tattoo wey dey important to religion and to fashion don dey exist for many centuries.
Many, many years back for dis part of Africa, pipo believe say na only Muslims fit do henna designs for dia bodi.
Back in dos days women dey do di design especially during Eid celebrations, wedding and naming ceremonies plus oda special occasions. E still be di same reach today.
Islam religion also believe say na only women suppose do henna tattoo for dia bodi as dis go separate dem from di men.
But all dat one don change as henna tattoo don turn fashion and more pipo wey no be Muslims, plus including men sef dey use am make dem sef beautiful.
For most of dis pipo dem prefer to do henna design dan to do oyibo kain tattoo wey dey permanent and no dey eva commot.

Production by Onyinye Chime and Abdulmalik Fahd Abdulmalik, Camera man Gift Ufuoma.
synopses.medium: Weda na for religion or fashion, henna design na natural way to tattoo bodi witout any wahala.

headlines.headline: Di codeine investigation wey change Nigeria

items.summary: Africa Eye chook eye inside di abuse of codeine cough syrup wey turn many Nigerians to addict.

media.title: Di codeine investigation wey change Nigeria

synopses.short: Africa Eye: How one codeine investigation change Nigeria
synopses.long:
BBC Africa Eye tear rubber for April 2018 with Sweet Sweet Codeine, one feem wey Nigerian investigative journalist Ruona Meyer present.

E show di abuse of di cough syrup medicine with codeine wey pipo suppose take afta prescription. Codeine cough syrup bin dey make pipo dey addicted -  millions of young pipo wey dey expose to am na im sabi pipo bin say dey addicted to di syrup.

BBC Africa Eye tori pesin Zuhura Yunus continue di tori of how di codeine story shine light ontop how dem bin dey sell am for black market.
synopses.medium: Africa Eye chook eye inside di abuse of codeine cough syrup wey turn many Nigerians to addict.

media.caption: Africa Eye: How one codeine investigation change Nigeria

headlines.headline: "Dance big pass how pipo dey take see am"

items.summary: Kaffy say if di goment know di importance of dance sef dem go put am for our curriculum.

media.title: "Dance big pass how pipo dey take see am"

synopses.short: Kaffy say if di goment know di importance of dance sef dem go put am for our curriculum
synopses.long:
E don tey wey Kafayat Oluwatoyin aka Kaffy don dey dance sotey she don turn am to business.

Kaffy follow BBC pidgin tok ontop how she take choose dance even though na pesin wey dey fly and repair plane she bin wan become for life before. 

She tok how dance take help her many times for her life “as adult di period of my life wey I tackle depression based on tins wey dey happen for me for inside house, wit di use of dance and di work wey I dey do as dancer, e continue to dey help me to remind me say make you no let your problem to define you” – as she tok.

She feel say pipo suppose dey appreciate dance for Nigeria pass as e dey now and pipo suppose get place wia dem fit go to learn dance if dem wan take am as work just as doctors and lawyers dem too get, “dat na why we say make we create platform like ‘The dance workshop Africa’ wey go empower, train and deal wit di problems wey we dey deal wit as pipo wey dey creative industry” she tok.

Kaffy bin win Guinness world record for “Longest Dance Party" for 2006, she dey married and she get two children wey she say be di biggest achievement for her life.
synopses.medium: Kaffy say if di goment know di importance of dance sef dem go put am for our curriculum.

media.caption: Kaffy say if di goment know di importance of dance sef dem go put am for our curriculum
